column4: I have a problem with audio after most recent update today, audio in the right channel especially sounds muddy. Using ubuntu 9.10 64bit, I just did a update that included libopenal I think. Can anyone help troubleshoot?
did you upgraded what >? alsa,oss pulseaudio.. ? did you cecked the audio settings?
I am not sure exactly which packages were updated, is there a log that the update manager keeps somewhere?
